item.title: Killer Rabbit
item.author: Jack Haydock
item.description:
There’s a somewhat morbid charm to cute things being violent. No story or purpose behind this one, just thought it would be fun.

Click image to see larger version
Again, there is only one code, despite multiple images.

item.title: Internal Combustion Penguin
item.author: Jack Haydock
item.description:
This one is based on a pun a friend of mine made, I liked it so much I made a quick image to match it. This was made very quickly, by my standards, so there’s is not much to it. I may revisit it to add backgrounds or other features later.

Click image to see larger version

item.title: Cats!
item.author: Jack Haydock
item.description:
Cats! Not for any particular reason, just have some cats.

Click image to see larger version
P.S. There may be four images but there is only one code

item.title: Secret Codes?
item.author: Jack Haydock
item.description:
To anyone who has noticed alpha-numeric codes poorly hidden in the images, they are steam (sometimes Uplay or Origin) codes for games I am giving away. I have too many unredeemed games, usually through humble bundles, and have decided, instead of just leaving them unclaimed or tediously trying to figure out who would be best to give them to, to just give them away as rewards for people who pay attention to my work (yes I’m that desperate for attention).

So long as I have spare keys for games I don’t want or already have, I will hide a code in every image I publish and the first person the find and claim it gets the game. Most codes will be for Steam, though if it doesn’t work try Uplay or Origin. If none of those work, the game may have already been claimed. If you find a code and discover it to be a game you don’t want or already have, please gift it to someone or just don’t claim it and let someone else find it, don’t be greedy! or I’ll set the cat on you, don’t be fooled by his cuteness, he will kill you!

Click image to see larger version
P.S. There is no code in this image, ironically I forgot to include one on the page about the codes.
  • How to redeem steam codes
  • How to gift games on steam
  • How to redeem Uplay codes
  • How to redeem Origin codes

item.title: Happy New Year!
item.author: Jack Haydock
item.description:
…well at least have a better one than 2016.

This one was a bit rushed so there are a few problems such as inconsistent shading and lack of detailing, but otherwise I am still pleased with it.

Click image to see larger version

item.title: Merry Christmas!
item.author: Jack Haydock
item.description:
Someone didn’t think the stocking placement through, or maybe it’s on purpose.

I had originally intended to make the Rubber Monkey cat’s fur a tortoiseshell brown/black colour, however finding that too difficult, I gave up and made it plain white.

Click image to see larger version
